name: NPR
text:
This year's pilgrimage to the Basilica of Our Lady of Guadalupe was canceled, so one church put a portrait of Our Lady on a truck.

"This year instead of the people going on pilgrimage to the mother, it is the mother who goes on pilgrimage to her people."
https://t.co/77vpU3cv7C

name: NPR
text: Vaccines are en route. An executive with UPS told NPR about the complicated and challenging journey. https://t.co/gbwWOajg0i
